casebody.data:
GPA-I, LP, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 00-5115. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: May 9, 2001.

Before LOURIE and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges, PLAGER, Senior Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
